ai-sn45:5.1.2_0: Then several mendicants went up to the Buddha ...
ai-sn45:5.1.2_1: and sat down on one side.
ai-sn45:5.2.1_0: “Sir, sometimes wanderers who follow other paths ask us:
ai-sn45:5.2.2_0: ‘Reverends, what’s the purpose of leading the spiritual life under the ascetic Gotama?’
ai-sn45:5.2.4_0: ‘The purpose of leading the spiritual life under the Buddha is to completely understand suffering.’
ai-sn45:5.2.5_0: Answering this way, we trust that we repeat what the Buddha has said, and don’t misrepresent him with an untruth. We trust our explanation is in line with the teaching, and that there are no legitimate grounds for rebuke or criticism.”
ai-sn45:5.3.1_0: “Indeed, in answering this way you repeat what I’ve said, and don’t misrepresent me with an untruth. Your explanation is in line with the teaching, and there are no legitimate grounds for rebuke or criticism.
ai-sn45:5.3.2_0: For the purpose of leading the spiritual life under me is to completely understand suffering.
ai-sn45:5.3.3_0: If wanderers who follow other paths were to ask you:
ai-sn45:5.3.4_0: ‘Is there a path and a practice for completely understanding that suffering?’ You should answer them like this:
ai-sn45:5.4.5_0: When questioned by wanderers who follow other paths, that’s how you should answer them.”
ai-sn45:6.1.2_0: Then a mendicant went up to the Buddha
ai-sn45:6.1.3_0: “Sir, they speak of this thing called the ‘spiritual path’.
ai-sn45:6.1.4_0: What is the spiritual path? And what is the culmination of the spiritual path?”
ai-sn45:6.2.1_0: “Mendicant, the spiritual path is simply this noble eightfold path, that is:
ai-sn45:6.2.3_0: The ending of greed, hate, and delusion.
ai-sn45:6.2.4_0: this is the culmination of the spiritual path.”

ai-sn45:7.1.2_0: Then a mendicant went up to the Buddha
ai-sn45:7.2.1_0: “Sir, they speak of this thing called ‘not free of greed, hate, and delusion’.
ai-sn45:7.2.6_0: It’s used to speak of the ending of defilements.”
ai-sn45:7.3.1_0: When he said this, that mendicant said to the Buddha:
ai-sn45:7.3.2_0: “Sir, they speak of this thing called the ‘the deathless’.
ai-sn45:7.3.3_0: What is the deathless? And what is the path that leads to the deathless?”
ai-sn45:7.3.4_0: “Mendicant, the ending of greed, hate, and delusion
ai-sn45:7.3.6_0: The path that leads to the deathless is simply this noble eightfold path, that is:
ai-sn45:7.3.7_0: right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.”
ai-sn45:8.1.2_0: “Mendicants, I will teach and analyze for you the noble eightfold path.
ai-sn45:8.1.3_0: Listen and pay close attention, I will speak.”
ai-sn45:8.2.1_0: “And what is the noble eightfold path?
ai-sn45:8.2.2_0: that is: right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.
ai-sn45:8.3.1_0: Now what, monks, is right view?
ai-sn45:8.3.2_0: Knowing about suffering, the origin of suffering, the cessation of suffering, and the practice that leads to the cessation of suffering.
ai-sn45:8.4.2_0: It is the thought of renunciation, good will, and harmlessness.
ai-sn45:8.5.1_0: Now what, monks, is right speech?
ai-sn45:8.5.2_0: Avoiding speech that’s false, divisive, harsh, or nonsensical.
ai-sn45:8.5.3_0: This, monks, is called right speech.
ai-sn45:8.6.2_0: Avoiding killing living creatures, stealing, and sexual activity.
ai-sn45:8.7.1_0: Now what, monks, is right livelihood?
ai-sn45:8.7.2_0: It’s when a noble disciple gives up wrong livelihood and earns a living by right livelihood.
ai-sn45:8.7.3_0: This, monks, is called right livelihood.
ai-sn45:8.8.2_0: It’s when a mendicant generates enthusiasm, tries, makes an effort, exerts the mind, and strives so that bad, unskillful qualities don’t arise. ...
ai-sn45:8.8.3_0: so that unskillful qualities are given up ...
ai-sn45:8.8.5_0: so that skillful qualities that have arisen remain, are not lost, but increase, mature, and are completed by development.
ai-sn45:8.9.2_0: It’s when a mendicant meditates by observing an aspect of the body—keen, aware, and mindful, rid of desire and aversion for the world.
ai-sn45:8.9.4_0: They meditate observing an aspect of the mind—keen, aware, and mindful, rid of desire and aversion for the world.
ai-sn45:8.9.5_0: principles—keen, aware, and mindful, rid of desire and aversion for the world.
ai-sn45:8.10.1_0: Now what, monks, is right concentration?
ai-sn45:8.10.2_0: Now, take a mendicant who, quite secluded from sensual pleasures, secluded from unskillful qualities, enters and remains in the first absorption, which has the rapture and bliss born of seclusion, while placing the mind and keeping it connected.
ai-sn45:8.10.3_0: As the placing of the mind and keeping it connected are stilled, they enter and remain in the second absorption ...
ai-sn45:8.10.4_0: And with the fading away of rapture, they enter and remain in the third absorption, where they meditate with equanimity, mindful and aware, personally experiencing the bliss of which the noble ones declare, ‘Equanimous and mindful, one meditates in bliss.’
ai-sn45:8.10.4_1: ‘One is even-minded, mindful, and abides in bliss.’
ai-sn45:8.10.5_0: Giving up pleasure and pain, and ending former happiness and sadness, they enter and remain in the fourth absorption, without pleasure or pain, with pure equanimity and mindfulness.
ai-sn45:9.1.2_0: “Mendicants, suppose a spike of rice or barley was pointing the wrong way. If you trod on it with hand or foot, there’s no way it could break the skin and produce blood.
ai-sn45:9.1.4_0: Because the spike is pointing the wrong way.
ai-sn45:9.1.5_0: In the same way, a mendicant whose view and development of the path is pointing the wrong way cannot break ignorance, produce knowledge, and realize extinguishment.
ai-sn45:9.1.7_0: Because their view is pointing the wrong way.
ai-sn45:9.2.1_0: Suppose a spike of rice or barley was pointing the right way. If you trod on it with hand or foot, it may well break the skin and produce blood.
ai-sn45:9.2.3_0: Because the spike is pointing the right way.
ai-sn45:9.2.4_0: In the same way, a mendicant whose view and development of the path is pointing the right way may well break ignorance, produce knowledge, and realize extinguishment.
ai-sn45:9.2.6_0: Because their view is pointing the right way.
ai-sn45:9.3.1_0: And how does a mendicant whose view and development of the path is pointing the right way break ignorance, give rise to knowledge, and realize extinguishment?
ai-sn45:9.3.2_0: It’s when a mendicant develops right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion, which rely on seclusion, fading away, and cessation, and ripen as letting go.
ai-sn45:9.3.2_1: right immersion, which relies on seclusion, fading away, and cessation, and ripens as letting go.
ai-sn45:9.3.3_0: That’s how a mendicant whose view and development of the path is pointing the right way breaks ignorance, gives rise to knowledge, and realizes extinguishment.”
ai-sn45:10.1.2_0: Then the wanderer Nandiya went up to the Buddha, and exchanged greetings with him.
ai-sn45:10.1.3_0: and after exchanging courteous talk and greetings, he sat down on one side.
ai-sn45:10.1.3_1: While sitting on one side the wanderer Nandiya said this to the Fortunate One:
ai-sn45:10.1.4_0: “Master Gotama, how many things, when developed and cultivated, have extinguishment as their culmination, destination, and end?”
ai-sn45:10.2.1_0: “Nandiya, these eight things, when developed and cultivated, have extinguishment as their culmination, destination, and end.
ai-sn45:10.2.2_0: What are the teachings grouped by eight?
ai-sn45:10.2.3_0: that is: right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.
ai-sn45:10.2.4_0: These eight things, when developed and cultivated, have extinguishment as their culmination, destination, and end.”
ai-sn45:10.2.5_0: When he said this, the wanderer Nandiya said to the Buddha,
ai-sn45:10.2.7_0: From this day forth, may Master Gotama remember me as a lay follower who has gone for refuge for life.”

ai-sn45:11.1.2_0: “Mendicants, I wish to go on retreat for a fortnight.

ai-sn45:11.1.4_0: “Yes, sir,” replied those mendicants. And no-one approached him, except the one who brought the alms-food.
ai-sn45:11.2.1_0: Then after a fortnight had passed, the Buddha came out of retreat and addressed the mendicants:
ai-sn45:11.2.2_0: “Mendicants, I’ve been practicing part of the meditation I practiced when I was first awakened.
ai-sn45:11.2.4_0: there’s feeling conditioned by wrong view
ai-sn45:11.2.5_0: and feeling conditioned by right view. ...
ai-sn45:11.2.6_0: There’s feeling conditioned by wrong immersion
ai-sn45:11.2.7_0: and feeling conditioned by right immersion.
ai-sn45:11.2.11_0: As long as desire, thought, and perception are not stilled, there is feeling conditioned by that.
ai-sn45:11.2.12_0: When desire, thought, and perception are stilled, there is feeling conditioned by that.
ai-sn45:11.2.13_0: There is effort to attain the unattained. When that state has been attained, there is also feeling conditioned by that.”
ai-sn45:12.1.2_0: “Mendicants, I wish to go on retreat for three months.
ai-sn45:12.1.3_0: No-one should approach me, except for the one who brings my alms-food.”
ai-sn45:12.1.4_0: “Yes, sir,” replied those mendicants. And no-one approached him, except the one who brought the alms-food.

ai-sn45:12.2.18_0: When desire, thought, and perception are stilled, there is feeling conditioned by that.

ai-sn45:21.1.2_0: “Mendicants, I will teach you the wrong way and the right way.
ai-sn45:21.1.4_0: And what is the wrong way?
ai-sn45:21.1.5_0: It is wrong view, wrong thought, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, and wrong immersion.
ai-sn45:21.1.6_0: This is called the wrong way.
ai-sn45:21.1.7_0: And what is the right way?
ai-sn45:21.1.8_0: that is: right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.
ai-sn45:21.1.9_0: This is called the right way.”

ai-sn45:22.1.5_0: It is wrong view, wrong thought, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, and wrong immersion.
ai-sn45:22.1.8_0: that is: right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.

ai-sn45:23.1.8_0: that is: right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.
ai-sn45:23.1.9_0: This is called the right practice.”

ai-sn45:24.2.2_0: It is wrong view, wrong thought, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, and wrong immersion.

ai-sn45:24.3.2_0: Because of right practice, both laypeople and renunciates succeed in the procedure of the skillful teaching.

ai-sn45:25.1.2_0: “Mendicants, I will teach you a bad person and a good person.
ai-sn45:25.1.4_0: And what is a bad person?
ai-sn45:25.1.5_0: It’s someone who has wrong view, wrong thought, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, and wrong immersion.
ai-sn45:25.1.6_0: This is called a bad person.
ai-sn45:25.2.1_0: And what is a good person?
ai-sn45:25.2.2_0: It’s someone who has right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.
ai-sn45:25.2.3_0: This is called a good person.”
ai-sn45:26.1.2_0: “Mendicants, I will teach you a better person and a better person.
ai-sn45:26.1.3_0: a good person and a better person.
ai-sn45:26.1.5_0: And what is a bad person?
ai-sn45:26.1.6_0: It’s someone who has wrong view, wrong thought, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, and wrong immersion.
ai-sn45:26.1.7_0: This is called a bad person.
ai-sn45:26.2.1_0: And what is a worse person?
ai-sn45:26.2.2_0: It’s someone who has wrong view, wrong thought, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, wrong immersion, wrong knowledge, and wrong freedom.
ai-sn45:26.2.3_0: This is called a worse person.
ai-sn45:26.3.1_0: And what is a good person?
ai-sn45:26.3.2_0: It’s someone who has right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.
ai-sn45:26.3.3_0: This is called a good person.
ai-sn45:26.4.1_0: And what is a better person?
ai-sn45:26.4.2_0: It’s someone who has right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right immersion, right knowledge, and right freedom.
ai-sn45:26.4.3_0: This is called a better person.”

ai-sn45:28.1.2_0: “Mendicants, I will teach you noble right immersion with its vital conditions and its prerequisites.
ai-sn45:28.1.4_0: And what is noble right immersion with its vital conditions and its prerequisites?
ai-sn45:28.1.5_0: There are right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, and right mindfulness.
ai-sn45:28.1.6_0: Unification of mind with these seven factors as prerequisites
ai-sn45:28.1.7_0: is called noble right immersion with its vital conditions and its prerequisites.”

ai-sn45:30.1.2_0: Then Venerable Uttiya went up to the Buddha ...
ai-sn45:30.1.2_1: He bowed, sat down to one side, and said to the Buddha:
ai-sn45:30.1.3_0: “Just now, sir, as I was in private retreat this thought came to mind:
ai-sn45:30.1.4_0: ‘The Buddha has spoken of the five kinds of sensual stimulation,
ai-sn45:30.1.7_0: I have spoken of these five kinds of sensual stimulation.
ai-sn45:30.1.9_0: Sights known by the eye that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing.
ai-sn45:30.1.13_0: Touches known by the body that are likable, desirable, agreeable, pleasant, sensual, and arousing.
ai-sn45:30.1.14_0: These are the five kinds of sensual stimulation that I’ve spoken of.
ai-sn45:30.1.15_0: The noble eightfold path should be developed to give up these five kinds of sensual stimulation.
ai-sn45:30.1.16_0: What is the noble eightfold path?
ai-sn45:30.1.17_0: that is: right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.
ai-sn45:30.1.18_0: This is the noble eightfold path that should be developed to give up these five kinds of sensual stimulation.”

ai-sn45:41.1.2_0: “Mendicants, if wanderers who follow another path were to ask you:
ai-sn45:41.1.3_0: ‘Reverends, what’s the purpose of leading the spiritual life under the ascetic Gotama?’ You should answer them like this:
ai-sn45:41.1.4_0: ‘The purpose of leading the spiritual life under the Buddha is the fading away of greed.’
ai-sn45:41.1.5_0: If wanderers who follow other paths were to ask you:
ai-sn45:41.1.6_0: ‘Is there a path and a practice for the fading away of greed?’ You should answer them like this:
ai-sn45:41.1.11_0: This is the path and the practice that leads to the fading away of greed.
ai-sn45:41.1.12_0: When questioned by wanderers who follow other paths, that’s how you should answer them.”

ai-sn45:139.1.2_0: “Mendicants, the Realized One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha, is said to be the best of all sentient beings—be they footless, with two feet, four feet, or many feet; with form or formless; with perception or without perception or with neither perception nor non-perception.
ai-sn45:139.1.3_0: In the same way, all skillful qualities are rooted in diligence and meet at diligence,
ai-sn45:139.1.4_0: and diligence is said to be the best of them.
ai-sn45:139.1.5_0: A mendicant who is diligent can expect to develop and cultivate the noble eightfold path.
ai-sn45:139.1.6_0: And how does a mendicant who is diligent develop and cultivate the noble eightfold path?
ai-sn45:139.1.7_0: It’s when a mendicant develops right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion, which rely on seclusion, fading away, and cessation, and ripen as letting go.
ai-sn45:139.1.7_1: right immersion, which relies on seclusion, fading away, and cessation, and ripens as letting go.
ai-sn45:139.1.8_0: That’s how a mendicant who is diligent develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path.

ai-sn45:139.4.5_0: And how does a mendicant who is diligent develop and cultivate the noble eightfold path?
ai-sn45:139.4.6_0: “... slants, slopes, and inclines to extinguishment ...”
ai-sn45:139.4.6_1: right immersion, which slants, slopes, and inclines to extinguishment.
ai-sn45:139.4.7_0: That’s how a mendicant who is diligent develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path.”
ai-sn45:140.1.1_0: “The footprints of all creatures that walk can fit inside an elephant’s footprint.
ai-sn45:140.1.2_0: So an elephant’s footprint is said to be the biggest of them all.
ai-sn45:140.1.3_0: In the same way, all skillful qualities are rooted in diligence and meet at diligence,
ai-sn45:140.1.3_1: and diligence is said to be the best of them.
ai-sn45:140.1.4_0: A mendicant who is diligent can expect to develop and cultivate the noble eightfold path.
ai-sn45:140.1.5_0: And how does a mendicant who is diligent develop and cultivate the noble eightfold path?
ai-sn45:140.1.6_0: It’s when a mendicant develops right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion, which rely on seclusion, fading away, and cessation, and ripen as letting go.
ai-sn45:140.1.6_1: right immersion, which relies on seclusion, fading away, and cessation, and ripens as letting go.
ai-sn45:140.1.7_0: That’s how a mendicant who is diligent develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path.”
ai-sn45:141-145.1.1_0: “Mendicants, the rafters of a bungalow all lean to the peak, slope to the peak, and meet at the peak.
ai-sn45:141-145.1.1_1: They’re said to be the best of them,
ai-sn45:141-145.1.2_0: In the same way, when the noble ones are overseerated ...
ai-sn45:141-145.1.3_0: (This should be told in full as in the previous discourse.)
ai-sn45:141-145.2.1_0: “Of all kinds of fragrant root, spikenard is said to be the best. ...”
ai-sn45:141-145.2.2_0: In the same way, when the noble ones are overseerated ...
ai-sn45:141-145.3.1_0: “Of all kinds of fragrant heartwood, red sandalwood is said to be the best. ...”
ai-sn45:141-145.3.2_0: In the same way, when the noble ones are overseerated ...
ai-sn45:141-145.4.1_0: “Of all kinds of fragrant flower, jasmine is said to be the best. ...”
ai-sn45:141-145.4.2_0: In the same way, when the noble ones are overseerated ...
ai-sn45:141-145.4.3_0: The sixth offering to an individual.
ai-sn45:141-145.5.1_0: “All lesser kings are vassals of a wheel-turning monarch, so the wheel-turning monarch is said to be the foremost of them all. ...”
ai-sn45:141-145.5.2_0: In the same way, when the noble ones are overseerated ...
ai-sn45:146-148.1.1_0: “The radiance of all the stars is not worth a sixteenth part of the moon’s radiance, so the moon’s radiance is said to be the best of them all. ...”
ai-sn45:146-148.1.2_0: In the same way, when the noble ones are overseerated ...
ai-sn45:146-148.2.1_0: “After the rainy season the sky is clear and cloudless. And when the sun rises, it dispels all the darkness from the sky as it shines and glows and radiates.
ai-sn45:146-148.2.2_0: In the same way, when the noble ones are overseerated ...
ai-sn45:146-148.3.1_0: “Mendicants, cloth from Kāsī is said to be the best kind of woven cloth. ...”
ai-sn45:146-148.3.2_0: In the same way, all skillful qualities are rooted in diligence and meet at diligence,
ai-sn45:146-148.3.3_0: and diligence is said to be the best of them.
ai-sn45:146-148.3.4_0: A mendicant who is diligent can expect to develop and cultivate the noble eightfold path.
ai-sn45:146-148.3.5_0: And how does a mendicant who is diligent develop and cultivate the noble eightfold path?
ai-sn45:146-148.3.6_0: It’s when a mendicant develops right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion, which rely on seclusion, fading away, and cessation, and ripen as letting go.
ai-sn45:146-148.3.6_1: right immersion, which relies on seclusion, fading away, and cessation, and ripens as letting go.
ai-sn45:146-148.3.7_0: That’s how a mendicant who is diligent develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path.”
ai-sn45:146-148.3.9_0: (These should all be expanded as in the section on the Realized One.)
ai-sn45:146-148.3.10_0: The fifth sub-chapter on diligence is finished.
ai-sn45:146-148.4.1_0: The Realized One, footprint, roof peak,
ai-sn45:146-148.4.4_0: and cloth is the tenth footprint.
ai-sn45:149.1.2_0: “Mendicants, all the hard work that gets done depends on the earth and is grounded on the earth.
ai-sn45:149.1.3_0: In the same way, a mendicant develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path depending on and grounded on ethics.
ai-sn45:149.1.4_0: And how does a mendicant develop the noble eightfold path depending on and grounded on ethics?
ai-sn45:149.1.5_0: It’s when a mendicant develops right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion, which rely on seclusion, fading away, and cessation, and ripen as letting go.
ai-sn45:149.1.6_0: That’s how a mendicant grounded on ethics develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path.”
ai-sn45:149.3.1_0: all the hard work that gets done depends on the earth and is grounded on the earth.
ai-sn45:149.3.2_0: In the same way, a mendicant develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path depending on and grounded on ethics.
ai-sn45:149.3.3_0: And how does a mendicant develop the noble eightfold path depending on and grounded on ethics?
ai-sn45:149.3.4_0: It’s when a mendicant develops right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion, which culminate in the removal of greed, hate, and delusion ...”
ai-sn45:149.3.4_1: right immersion, which culminate in the removal of greed, hate, and delusion.
ai-sn45:149.3.5_0: That’s how a mendicant grounded on ethics develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path.”
ai-sn45:149.4.1_0: all the hard work that gets done depends on the earth and is grounded on the earth.
ai-sn45:149.4.2_0: In the same way, a mendicant develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path depending on and grounded on ethics.
ai-sn45:149.4.3_0: And how does a mendicant develop the noble eightfold path depending on and grounded on ethics?
ai-sn45:149.4.4_0: “... culminate, finish, and end in the deathless ...”
ai-sn45:149.4.4_1: right immersion, which culminate, finish, and end in the deathless.
ai-sn45:149.4.5_0: That’s how a mendicant grounded on ethics develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path.”
ai-sn45:149.5.1_0: all the hard work that gets done depends on the earth and is grounded on the earth.
ai-sn45:149.5.2_0: In the same way, a mendicant develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path depending on and grounded on ethics.
ai-sn45:149.5.3_0: And how does a mendicant develop the noble eightfold path depending on and grounded on ethics?
ai-sn45:149.5.4_0: “... slants, slopes, and inclines to extinguishment ...”
ai-sn45:149.5.4_1: right immersion, which slants, slopes, and inclines to extinguishment.
ai-sn45:149.5.5_0: That’s how a mendicant grounded on ethics develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path.”
ai-sn45:150.1.1_0: “All the plants and seeds that achieve growth, increase, and maturity do so depending on the earth and grounded on the earth.
ai-sn45:150.1.2_0: In the same way, a mendicant develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path depending on and grounded on ethics, achieving growth, increase, and maturity in good qualities.
ai-sn45:150.1.3_0: And how does a mendicant develop the noble eightfold path depending on and grounded on ethics, achieving growth, increase, and maturity in good qualities?
ai-sn45:150.1.4_0: It’s when a mendicant develops right view ...
ai-sn45:150.1.4_1: right immersion, which relies on seclusion, fading away, and cessation, and ripens as letting go.
ai-sn45:150.1.5_0: That’s how a mendicant develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path depending on and grounded on ethics, achieving growth, increase, and maturity in good qualities.”
ai-sn45:151.1.1_0: “Mendicants, dragons grow and wax strong supported by the Himalayas, the king of mountains.
ai-sn45:151.1.2_0: When they’re strong they dive into the pools. Then they dive into the lakes, the streams, the rivers, and finally the ocean. There they acquire a great and abundant body.
ai-sn45:151.1.3_0: In the same way, a mendicant develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path depending on and grounded on ethics, acquiring great and abundant good qualities.
ai-sn45:151.1.4_0: And how does a mendicant develop the noble eightfold path depending on and grounded on ethics, acquiring great and abundant good qualities?
ai-sn45:151.1.5_0: It’s when a mendicant develops right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion, which rely on seclusion, fading away, and cessation, and ripen as letting go.
ai-sn45:151.1.5_1: right immersion, which relies on seclusion, fading away, and cessation, and ripens as letting go.
ai-sn45:151.1.6_0: That’s how a mendicant develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path depending on and grounded on ethics, acquiring great and abundant good qualities.”
ai-sn45:152.1.1_0: “Mendicants, suppose a tree slants, slopes, and inclines to the east.
ai-sn45:152.1.2_0: It wouldn’t be cut off at the root?”
ai-sn45:152.1.3_0: “Sir, it would fall in the direction that it slants, slopes, and inclines.”
ai-sn45:152.1.4_0: “In the same way, a mendicant who develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path slants, slopes, and inclines to extinguishment.
ai-sn45:152.1.5_0: And how does a mendicant who develops the noble eightfold path slant, slope, and incline to extinguishment?
ai-sn45:152.1.6_0: It’s when a mendicant develops right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion, which rely on seclusion, fading away, and cessation, and ripen as letting go.
ai-sn45:152.1.6_1: right immersion, which relies on seclusion, fading away, and cessation, and ripens as letting go.
ai-sn45:152.1.7_0: That’s how a mendicant who develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path slants, slopes, and inclines to extinguishment.”
ai-sn45:153.1.1_0: “Mendicants, suppose a pot full of water is tipped over, so the water drains out and doesn’t go back in.
ai-sn45:153.1.2_0: In the same way, a mendicant who develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path expels bad, unskillful qualities and doesn’t let them back in.
ai-sn45:153.1.3_0: And how does a mendicant who develops the noble eightfold path expel bad, unskillful qualities and not let them back in?
ai-sn45:153.1.4_0: It’s when a mendicant develops right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion, which rely on seclusion, fading away, and cessation, and ripen as letting go.
ai-sn45:153.1.4_1: right immersion, which relies on seclusion, fading away, and cessation, and ripens as letting go.
ai-sn45:153.1.5_0: That’s how a mendicant who develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path expels bad, unskillful qualities and doesn’t let them back in.”
ai-sn45:154.1.1_0: “Mendicants, suppose a spike of rice or barley was pointing the right way. If you trod on it with hand or foot, it may well break the skin and produce blood.
ai-sn45:154.1.3_0: Because the spike is pointing the right way.
ai-sn45:154.1.4_0: In the same way, a mendicant whose view and development of the path is pointing the right way may well break ignorance, produce knowledge, and realize extinguishment.
ai-sn45:154.1.6_0: Because their view is pointing the right way.
ai-sn45:154.1.7_0: And how does a mendicant whose view and development of the path is pointing the right way break ignorance, give rise to knowledge, and realize extinguishment?
ai-sn45:154.1.8_0: It’s when a mendicant develops right view ...
ai-sn45:154.1.8_1: right immersion, which relies on seclusion, fading away, and cessation, and ripens as letting go.
ai-sn45:154.1.9_0: That’s how a mendicant whose view and development of the path is pointing the right way breaks ignorance, gives rise to knowledge, and realizes extinguishment.”
ai-sn45:154.1.10_0: The sixth offering to an individual.
ai-sn45:155.1.1_0: “Mendicants, various winds blow in the sky.
ai-sn45:155.1.2_0: Winds blow from the east, the west, the north, and the south. There are winds that are dusty and dustless, cool and warm, weak and strong.
ai-sn45:155.1.3_0: In the same way, when the noble eightfold path is developed and cultivated the following are fully developed: the four kinds of mindfulness meditation, the four right efforts, the four bases of psychic power, the five faculties, the five powers, and the seven awakening factors.
ai-sn45:155.1.4_0: And how are they fully developed?
ai-sn45:155.1.5_0: It’s when a mendicant develops right view ...
ai-sn45:155.1.5_1: right immersion, which relies on seclusion, fading away, and cessation, and ripens as letting go.
ai-sn45:156.1.1_0: “Mendicants, in the last month of summer, when the dust and dirt is stirred up, a large sudden storm disperses and settles it on the spot.
ai-sn45:156.1.2_0: In the same way, a mendicant who develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path disperses and stills bad, unskillful qualities on the spot.
ai-sn45:156.1.3_0: How does a mendicant who develops the noble eightfold path disperse and still bad, unskillful qualities on the spot?
ai-sn45:156.1.4_0: It’s when a mendicant develops right view ...
ai-sn45:156.1.4_1: right immersion, which relies on seclusion, fading away, and cessation, and ripens as letting go.
ai-sn45:156.1.5_0: That’s how a mendicant who develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path disperses and stills bad, unskillful qualities on the spot.”
ai-sn45:157.1.1_0: “Mendicants, when a large storm has arisen, a strong wind disperses and settles it as it proceeds.
ai-sn45:157.1.2_0: In the same way, a mendicant who develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path disperses and stills bad, unskillful qualities as they proceed.
ai-sn45:157.1.3_0: And how does a mendicant who develops the noble eightfold path disperse and still bad, unskillful qualities as they proceed?
ai-sn45:157.1.4_0: It’s when a mendicant develops right view ...
ai-sn45:157.1.4_1: right immersion, which relies on seclusion, fading away, and cessation, and ripens as letting go.
ai-sn45:157.1.5_0: That’s how a mendicant who develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path disperses and stills bad, unskillful qualities as they proceed.”
ai-sn45:158.1.1_0: “Mendicants, suppose there was a sea-faring ship bound together with ropes. For six months they deteriorated in the water. Then in the cold season it was hauled up on dry land, where the ropes were weathered by wind and sun. When the clouds soaked it with rain, the ropes would readily collapse and rot away.
ai-sn45:158.1.2_0: In the same way, when a mendicant develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path their fetters readily collapse and rot away.
ai-sn45:158.1.3_0: And how do they develop and cultivate the noble eightfold path so that their fetters readily collapse and rot away?
ai-sn45:158.1.4_0: It’s when a mendicant develops right view ...
ai-sn45:158.1.4_1: right immersion, which relies on seclusion, fading away, and cessation, and ripens as letting go.
ai-sn45:158.1.5_0: That’s how they develop and cultivate the noble eightfold path so that their fetters readily collapse and rot away.”
ai-sn45:159.1.1_0: “Mendicants, suppose there was a guest house.
ai-sn45:159.1.1_1: Lodgers come from the east, west, north, and south. Aristocrats, brahmins, merchants, and workers all stay there.
ai-sn45:159.1.2_0: In the same way, a mendicant who develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path completely understands and complete understanding these things.
ai-sn45:159.1.3_0: They give up by direct knowledge the things that should be given up by direct knowledge. They realize by direct knowledge the things that should be realized by direct knowledge. They develop by direct knowledge the things that should be developed by direct knowledge.
ai-sn45:159.2.1_0: And what are the things that should be completely understood by direct knowledge?
ai-sn45:159.2.2_0: It should be said: the five grasping aggregates.
ai-sn45:159.2.4_0: That is: form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
ai-sn45:159.2.5_0: These are the things that should be completely understood by direct knowledge.
ai-sn45:159.2.6_0: And what are the things that should be given up by direct knowledge?
ai-sn45:159.2.7_0: Ignorance and craving for continued existence.
ai-sn45:159.2.8_0: These are the things that should be given up by direct knowledge.
ai-sn45:159.2.9_0: And what are the things that should be realized by direct knowledge?
ai-sn45:159.2.11_0: These are the things that should be realized by direct knowledge.
ai-sn45:159.2.12_0: And what are the things that should be developed by direct knowledge?
ai-sn45:159.2.14_0: These are the things that should be developed by direct knowledge.
ai-sn45:159.2.15_0: And how does a mendicant develop the noble eightfold path in this way?
ai-sn45:159.2.15_1: They develop by direct knowledge those things that should be developed by direct knowledge.
ai-sn45:159.2.16_0: It’s when a mendicant develops right view ...
ai-sn45:159.2.16_1: right immersion, which relies on seclusion, fading away, and cessation, and ripens as letting go.
ai-sn45:159.2.17_0: That’s how a mendicant who develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path should give up these things.”
ai-sn45:160.1.1_0: “Mendicants, suppose that, although the Ganges river slants, slopes, and inclines to the east,
ai-sn45:160.1.2_0: a large crowd were to come along with a spade and basket, saying:
ai-sn45:160.1.3_0: ‘We’ll make this Ganges river slant, slope, and incline to the west!’
ai-sn45:160.1.8_0: The Ganges river slants, slopes, and inclines to the east.
ai-sn45:160.1.9_0: It’s not easy to make it slant, slope, and incline to the west.
ai-sn45:160.1.10_0: That large crowd will eventually get weary and frustrated.”
ai-sn45:160.1.11_0: “In the same way, while a mendicant develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path, if rulers or their ministers, friends or colleagues, relatives or family should invite them to accept wealth, saying:
ai-sn45:160.1.12_0: ‘Please, mister, why let these ocher robes torment you?
ai-sn45:160.1.13_0: Why follow the practice of shaving your head and carrying an alms bowl?
ai-sn45:160.1.14_0: Come, return to a lesser life, enjoy wealth, and make merit!’
ai-sn45:160.1.15_0: It’s simply impossible for a mendicant who develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path to resign the training and return to a lesser life.
ai-sn45:160.1.17_0: Because for a long time that mendicant’s mind has slanted, sloped, and inclined to seclusion. So it’s impossible for them to return to a lesser life.
ai-sn45:160.1.18_0: And how does a mendicant develop the noble eightfold path?
ai-sn45:160.1.19_0: It’s when a mendicant develops right view ...
ai-sn45:160.1.19_1: right immersion, which relies on seclusion, fading away, and cessation, and ripens as letting go.
ai-sn45:160.1.20_0: That’s how a mendicant develops and cultivates the noble eightfold path.”
ai-sn45:160.1.21_0: (These should all be expanded as in the section on which is to be done.)
ai-sn45:160.1.23_0: The sixth sub-chapter on work is finished.
ai-sn45:160.2.2_0: a tree, a pot, and a spike,
ai-sn45:160.2.3_0: the sky, and two on clouds,
ai-sn45:161.1.4_0: The search for sensual pleasures, for continued existence, and for a spiritual path.
ai-sn45:161.1.6_0: The noble eightfold path should be developed to directly know these three searches.
ai-sn45:161.1.7_0: What is the noble eightfold path?
ai-sn45:161.1.8_0: It’s when a mendicant develops right view ...
ai-sn45:161.1.8_1: right immersion, which relies on seclusion, fading away, and cessation, and ripens as letting go.
ai-sn45:161.1.9_0: This is the noble eightfold path that should be developed to directly know these three searches.”

ai-sn45:161.2.8_0: This is the noble eightfold path that should be developed to directly know these three searches.”

ai-sn45:161.4.5_0: The noble eightfold path should be developed to directly know these three searches.

ai-sn45:161.4.7_0: It’s when a mendicant develops right view ...
ai-sn45:161.4.7_1: right immersion, which slants, slopes, and inclines to extinguishment.
ai-sn45:161.4.8_0: This is the noble eightfold path that should be developed to directly know these three searches.”
ai-sn45:161.5.3_0: The search for sensual pleasures, for continued existence, and for a spiritual path.
ai-sn45:161.5.5_0: The noble eightfold path should be developed to completely understand ...”
ai-sn45:161.5.6_0: (This should be expanded as in the section on the complete understanding of all by direct knowledge.)
ai-sn45:161.6.3_0: The search for sensual pleasures, for continued existence, and for a spiritual path.
ai-sn45:161.6.5_0: The ending of these three searches ...
ai-sn45:161.6.5_1: This is the noble eightfold path that should be developed.
ai-sn45:161.6.6_0: (This should be expanded as in the section on the complete ending of very life.)
ai-sn45:161.7.3_0: The search for sensual pleasures, for continued existence, and for a spiritual path.
ai-sn45:161.7.5_0: This noble eightfold path should be developed to give up these three searches.
ai-sn45:161.7.6_0: What is the noble eightfold path?
ai-sn45:161.7.7_0: It’s when a mendicant develops right view ...
ai-sn45:161.7.7_1: right immersion, which relies on seclusion, fading away, and cessation, and ripens as letting go.
ai-sn45:161.7.8_0: This is the noble eightfold path that should be developed to give up these three searches.”
ai-sn45:161.7.9_0: (This should be expanded with “give up” instead of “directly know”.)
ai-sn45:162.1.1_0: “Mendicants, there are three kinds of discrimination.
ai-sn45:162.1.4_0: These are the three kinds of discrimination.
ai-sn45:162.1.5_0: The noble eightfold path should be developed for the direct knowledge, complete understanding, finishing, and giving up of these three kinds of discrimination.
ai-sn45:162.1.6_0: What is the noble eightfold path?
ai-sn45:162.1.7_0: It’s when a mendicant develops right view ...
ai-sn45:162.1.7_1: right immersion, which relies on seclusion, fading away, and cessation, and ripens as letting go.
ai-sn45:162.1.8_0: This is the noble eightfold path that should be developed for the direct knowledge, complete understanding, finishing, and giving up of these three kinds of discrimination.”
ai-sn45:162.1.9_0: (This should be expanded as in the section on searches.)
ai-sn45:163.1.3_0: The defilements of sensuality, desire to be reborn, and ignorance.
ai-sn45:163.1.5_1: This is the noble eightfold path that should be developed.”
ai-sn45:164.1.1_0: “There are these three states of existence.
ai-sn45:164.1.4_0: These are the three states of existence.
ai-sn45:164.1.5_1: This is the noble eightfold path that should be developed.”
ai-sn45:165.1.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these three forms of suffering.
ai-sn45:165.1.3_0: The suffering inherent in painful feeling; the suffering inherent in conditions; and the suffering inherent in perishing.
ai-sn45:165.1.4_0: These are the three forms of suffering.
ai-sn45:165.1.5_0: For the direct knowledge, complete understanding, finishing, and giving up of these three forms of suffering ...
ai-sn45:165.1.5_1: This is the noble eightfold path that should be developed.”
ai-sn45:166.1.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these three kinds of barrenness.
ai-sn45:166.1.4_0: These are the three kinds of barrenness.
ai-sn45:166.1.5_1: This is the noble eightfold path that should be developed.”

ai-sn45:173.1.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these four kinds of grasping.
ai-sn45:173.1.3_0: Grasping at sensual pleasures, views, precepts and observances, and theories of a self.
ai-sn45:173.1.4_0: These are the four kinds of grasping.
ai-sn45:173.1.5_0: The complete understanding of these four kinds of grasping ...
ai-sn45:173.1.5_1: This is the noble eightfold path that should be developed.”
ai-sn45:174.1.2_0: What are the teachings grouped by four?
ai-sn45:174.1.3_0: The personal ties to covetousness, ill will, misapprehension of precepts and observances, and the insistence that this is the only truth.
ai-sn45:174.1.5_0: These are the four ties for the direct knowledge, complete understanding, finishing, and giving up of these four ties.
ai-sn45:174.1.5_1: This is the noble eightfold path that should be developed.”
ai-sn45:175.1.1_0: “Mendicants, there are these seven underlying tendencies.

ai-sn45:175.1.3_0: The underlying tendencies of sensual desire, repulsion, views, doubt, conceit, desire to be reborn, and ignorance.

ai-sn45:175.1.5_1: This is the noble eightfold path that should be developed.”
